title: 1. What is Ebola virus disease?
content: Ebola Virus Disease is a severe, often fatal illness that has broken out in West Africa and the Democratic Republic of Congo. The illness affects humans and nonhuman primates like monkeys, gorillas, and chimpanzees. The illness can spread to other countries if these other countries do not take precautions to prevent it. Ghana has currently put up several measures to prevent the illness from coming into the country. These measures require your cooperation.
